content: i wanted to make a worsted weight version of my bulky weight hat spiralis 1 here it is the pattern includes instructions for two different weights of worsted yarn lighter or heavier and for three sizes for lighter worsted yarn ex malabrigo rios needles us 5 and us 7 small 160 yds medium 180 yds large 200 yds gauge 1 x 1 8 sts by 7 row in k2p2 relaxed for heavier worsted yarn ex vanna s choice needles us 6 and us 8 small 120 yds medium 140 yds large 160 yds gauge 1 x 1 6 sts by 7 row in k2p2 relaxed happy knitting 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spiralis-hat
